entities.name: ginny weasley
entities.description: Ginny Weasley seemed very disturbed by Mrs Norris’s fate.

entities.name: mrs norris
entities.description: According to Ron, she was a great cat-lover.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: ‘But you hadn’t really got to know Mrs Norris,’ Ron told her

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Nor could Harry and Ron get much response from her when they asked what she was up to,

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: The attack had also had an effect on Hermione.
